title: Between the Scenes - Uproar Over Serena Williams's U.S. Open Loss
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Uproar Over Serena Williams's U.S. Open Loss
description:
Trevor talks about Naomi Osaka's U.S. Open victory against Serena Williams and gives his take on the umpire's controversial penalties against Williams.
